- |snippet_verify_license|.
- |snippet_download| |url_ruby-installer|.
- Use the default installation directory.
- |update-installation-instructions| for |ruby|.
- Update the |ruby| entry in
  ``conf/env/paths_win32.txt`` and
  ``conf/env/paths_linux.txt``.
- |snippet_update_license| in
  ``docs/general/license-tables/license-info_ruby.csv``.
- |snippet_update_license| in
  ``docs/general/license-tables/license-info_ruby-installer.csv``.
- |snippet_changelog_entry|
- |snippet_commit|
  ``Dependency update: <XXXX>/Q<Y>: Ruby <version number>``.
